attributes.title: Absolutely terrible 😡😡😡😡
attributes.review: I was about to support the beloved president Donald jenuis trump but the 3 birds and cat randomly started to poop all over my floor when I opened the app. After all this I realized that TRUMP is RACIST and a RAPIST !!! He is a joke to society!!!! Even my birds agreee!!!!! Never again!!!!! 😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: i love the president, but.....
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app, i got radiation poisoning! my Amazon Alexa started recording like she was listening to something and my dog started puking all over the place! The app contained age restricted material, which i assumed was just to keep children out of it, but i opened it and was IMMEDIATELY greeted with images that i DID NOT WANT TO SEE. it started spamming my phone and the moment i complained verbally about it, my amazon alexa turned off and SOME GUY TURNED UP AT MY DOOR! i’m a minority and trump is my bias, but one of the trump stans showed up at my door wearing a confederate flag ONLY and demanded I leave the country because my skin is not pure white! i said “if the president can be orange, why can’t i be brown?!” he said “if you don’t like it here then leave! go back to your country!” i’m very patriotic and i’m 100% born and raised in america, hence why i am so in love with the president. But this man at my door was yelling racial slurs at me and telling me to go back home because the president didn’t want me here! I said “this is MY house and MY country!” he said “DONT TALK BACK TO ME!!!” and then picked me up and threw me onto my driveway. he was punching me while i was on the ground saying that i brought the chinese virus here so he doesn’t want to be near me! i was wearing a mask and he said i was a wimp for doing so and that the government is trying to control us! and then he said that since the president doesn’t wear a mask he doesn’t have to either! i’m writing this review in the hospital with a concussion and a cracked skull, and when i tried to open the app with my phone plugged in, it turned off the entire hospital’s electricity and froze my phone by spamming it with stupid messages. DONT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: It’s true.
attributes.review:
I didn’t believe it when I read the review that this app was cursed, but when I downloaded the app my cat collapsed in a furry heap and started twitching uncontrollably. He vomited blood everywhere and died a few minutes later.

 Mr. Scruffles was too young to die. He had nine whole lives ahead of him.

Of course, I wasn’t one to just assume the app did this, so I started typing in my phone number to get the verification code or whatever. A second later, someone crashed their car right outside my house. I went outside to see if they were okay but their car was totaled. Luckily the person in the crash survived but after two unfortunate accidents happing together within two minutes, I got suspicious. 

Then while I was trying to create my account, I got a call from my dad saying my mom died. I am devastated. My mom was my hero. 

DO NOT GET THIS APP.

It will ruin your life. Everyone you know and love will die for mysterious reasons. You might even hurt some poor stranger who did nothing wrong. THE CURSE IS REAL.
